Worst game ever. If you want to face hacker in each game then go ahead take it . it is free. I really do not recommend to spend single cent on this game and on what it offer inside as gamble.  Choose other game. do not trust anyone who say that this game is good and fun. It is not true. You can play without "hackers" on 3rd party servers, which is not true.  There are still hackers and you need to pay in addition for 3rd party server to "enjoy" hackers free game. If you still reading this and still decide to spend some money, go play fortnite or minecraft or spend money on Satisfactory. Run away as far as you can from CS game for ever.

Самое ужасное комьюнити в истории: русские свиньи и тупорылые пендосы доведут вас до инфаркта. Вы скажете почему тогда играешь, всё просто игра вызывает привыкание и азартную зависимость от чего нервная система уничтожается исрок жизни сокращается на 20 лет. 
А так в целом игра нормас советую!

It's a complex game with many different elements of skill to master, i enjoy it a lot. The community can tend to lean towards the rude if not toxic level, but that's why god invented mute all. All in all though, this game is absolutely fantastic and a blast with friends.
